lead_paragraph: BUICE--Stuart Upchurch. 12/1/42-3/29/15 "A Lady, the wonder of her kind, whose form was upborne by a lovely mind." (P.B. Shelley) On the first anniversary of your death, with our eternal love, Bill, Merrill, Charles and the family 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Memorials  BUICE, STUART UPCHURCH
